task.summary: Default task
Add Id to ToString in DTOs and also Equals etc. in Entities Add TypeName datetime(3) to Publication.Date Fix using 'using' with PublicationContext Add Publication Service Tests
Add join table AuthorPublication Fix tests Add Converter for Console Out to ITestOutputHelper to tests
Fix adding and deleting publication Add tests of adding two publications with the same author and deleting a publication where one has the same author
Remove unnecessary Address entity, DTO and table. Address is just a string
Add edition to publication Add Citation Service and prototype of book citation
Add Citation Facade Fix some code inspections
Split publication into book, article etc... Use AutoMapper insted of own mapper
Split publication into book, article etc... Use AutoMapper insted of own mapper Add mapper test for book
Fix names in book citations Add book citation tests
Reorganize citation service so the decision about publication content is on facade
Add Validation service to validate publications.
Merge back BookService to PublicationService.
Add article, use TPH in EF (data from publications in one table) Minor refactoring
Add article validation
Add article service implementation Add article citation
Add book HTML description Add article HTML description
Add book BibTex Add article BibTex
Upgrade Test SDK
Add ASN.Net Core GUI prototype
Add authors facade, service and gui listing
